title: My CookBook Pro (Ad Free)
summary: AD FREE VERSION OF My CookBook Recipe Manager.
description: * AD FREE VERSION OF My CookBook Recipe ManagerStore all your favorite recipes in one place! My CookBook is a recipe manager with search and import features.My CookBook lets you create your own digital cookbook.  Build your own recipe database by gathering recipes on the web and using the import features.It is you and your own cookery!You are looking for a new recipe ? Use our searching engine to find a new recipe on the web. When you have found one you like, import it into My CookBook. Then you will be able to view it everywhere on your phone or your tablet. You can add your own photo, change ingredients or directions, or add you own commentsYou already have a cookbook ? Add a new recipe into My CookBook manually, or import your digital cookbook using one of the file formats we support like Meal Master (.mmf), MasterCook (.mxp), LivingCookBook (.fdx) , ReKconv (.rk)...You want to share some recipes with your friends ? Invite your friends to join My CookBook, share your recipes with them and view their recipes. Or share your recipes on Facebook or by email, sms, and others. You can also send them a “My CookBook” file they will be able to load into their appMy CookBook also includes these features :• Create shopping lists using your recipe ingredients• Synchronize your recipes on different devices using dropbox• Scale the ingredients to serve more or less people• Use the speech feature to read recipes• Customize various parts of the app such as theme, font size, categories.• Open recipes on your Android Wear watchKiip rewards may be disabled in the settingsMy CookBook is also available on your desktop: http://www.mycookbook-online.net Create a free account on our online version My CookBook Online and you will enjoy these additional features (in the app and the website):• Save up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists in the cloud• Synchronize up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists between all your android applications and your online account• View and manage these recipes on any computer or any device• Invite your friends to join My CookBook Online and view their recipes• Plan your meals and generate a shopping list for the weekCreate a Premium account on My CookBook Online and :• All your recipes and shopping lists will be saved in the cloudMore details here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/pro/The creation of an account on My CookBook Online is optional and the number of recipes is not limited in the Android application.We support more than 200 websites. If your favorite cooking website is not supported, you can submit a request or vote for already submitted requests here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/siterequests/My CookBook , the only cooking app you need !We also have a free version of My CookBook which includes some ads : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.cookbookHelp us to translate My CookBook to other languages : https://mycookbook.oneskyapp.com*** My CookBook Pro does not include a subscription for My CookBook Online Premium ***Key words : cook, cooking, recipe, shopping list, recipe manager, meal planner
descriptionHTML:
* AD FREE VERSION OF My CookBook Recipe Manager

Store all your favorite recipes in one place! My CookBook is a recipe manager with search and import features.

My CookBook lets you create your own digital cookbook. Build your own recipe database by gathering recipes on the web and using the import features.
It is you and your own cookery!


You are looking for a new recipe ? Use our searching engine to find a new recipe on the web. When you have found one you like, import it into My CookBook. Then you will be able to view it everywhere on your phone or your tablet. You can add your own photo, change ingredients or directions, or add you own comments


You already have a cookbook ? Add a new recipe into My CookBook manually, or import your digital cookbook using one of the file formats we support like Meal Master (.mmf), MasterCook (.mxp), LivingCookBook (.fdx) , ReKconv (.rk)...


You want to share some recipes with your friends ? Invite your friends to join My CookBook, share your recipes with them and view their recipes. Or share your recipes on Facebook or by email, sms, and others. You can also send them a “My CookBook” file they will be able to load into their app


My CookBook also includes these features :
• Create shopping lists using your recipe ingredients
• Synchronize your recipes on different devices using dropbox
• Scale the ingredients to serve more or less people
• Use the speech feature to read recipes
• Customize various parts of the app such as theme, font size, categories.
• Open recipes on your Android Wear watch

Kiip rewards may be disabled in the settings


My CookBook is also available on your desktop: http://www.mycookbook-online.net


Create a free account on our online version My CookBook Online and you will enjoy these additional features (in the app and the website):
• Save up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists in the cloud
• Synchronize up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists between all your android applications and your online account
• View and manage these recipes on any computer or any device
• Invite your friends to join My CookBook Online and view their recipes
• Plan your meals and generate a shopping list for the week


Create a Premium account on My CookBook Online and :
• All your recipes and shopping lists will be saved in the cloud


More details here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/pro/


The creation of an account on My CookBook Online is optional and the number of recipes is not limited in the Android application.


We support more than 200 websites. If your favorite cooking website is not supported, you can submit a request or vote for already submitted requests here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/siterequests/




My CookBook , the only cooking app you need !





We also have a free version of My CookBook which includes some ads : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.cookbook


Help us to translate My CookBook to other languages : https://mycookbook.oneskyapp.com



*** My CookBook Pro does not include a subscription for My CookBook Online Premium ***


Key words : cook, cooking, recipe, shopping list, recipe manager, meal planner
comments: Love the app but discovered out of the blue today that I was on a trial premium subscription and I'm now limited in the number of recipes I can backup unless I pay an annual fee. It's a shame but I'll be looking for another app - one that offers more transparency on what they're offering. Tricking users isn't a great way to create loyalty.

Suggested changes are to have the option to convert between imperial and metric. Also, a timer function would be handy! No doubt more difficult is greater compatibility with more websites to get recipes - The guardian, chef steps, sorted food amongst others would be fantastic
The best recipe clipper app on the market.  It blows the competition out of the water in that regard.  Easy and intuitive to use.
No sync Unable to sync since last update. Please fix.
Great way to keep all my favorite  recipies, whether from on line source or from one of my old hard copy recipies.  Also, it is easy to share my recipies on line or by printed copy.  I just love it!
I primarily use it to access my Gourmet database on my tablet via Nextcloud sync. Works great, just requires occasional manual database export from Gourmet.
recentChanges: - Add a tag to your recipes from the recipe list page
- Recipe Edit : You can rotate your images
- New supported websites : Cooking Panda (en), Tasty.co (en), Ricette Mania (it), みんなのきょうの料理 (kyounoryouri.jp)
- Preferences : you can choose backup directories on your SD Card
